title: Bulk change inheritance
author: ptahbe
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
For some reason the inheritance changed on all the connections I have configured. I would like to be able to change change this for multiple connections in one go.

## Current Behavior
Now I have to click on a connection and select inherit all for each connection.

## Possible Solution
Enable bulk edit of inheritance (and other settings)
